channel.title: How to make Chaotic Maul wielded correctly and swing attacks?
channel.description: I am a little bit puzzled with how to add the swing for the chaotic maul hits and to make it 2 handed. I have a chaotic maul with the hits I want but I can't get it to be 2 handed in both hands. All help is appreciated, thanks!
